bibl.title: Testamentaria.
bibl.note: 1. Will (1). P. Lond. II, 375 descr. Ptolemais Euergetis, first half 2nd century A.D. - 2. Will (2). P. Lond. III, 1308 descr. Hermupolis, between 27 December A.D. 521 and 25 January A.D 522. - 3. Codicil. P. Lond. III, 1040 descr. - Pp. 232-236: Appendix 1. Chronological list of wills of the Ptolemaic, Roman and Byzantine periods, written in Greek or Latin and found in Egypt [Nos 1-166]; - 237-238: Appendix 2. Geographical distribution of the Greek and Roman Wills; - 238-239: Occurrences of εὐδοκίμησις as a title of address in chronological order [Nos 1-27]; - 239-241: Occurrences of εὐδοκιμώτατος as a title of address in Greek documentary papyri from Egypt [Nos 1-83].
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Lond. II, 375 descr.; III, 1040 descr.; 1308 descr.

1. Will (1). P. Lond. II, 375 descr. Ptolemais Euergetis, first half 2nd century A.D. - 2. Will (2). P. Lond. III, 1308 descr. Hermupolis, between 27 December A.D. 521 and 25 January A.D 522. - 3. Codicil. P. Lond. III, 1040 descr. - Pp. 232-236: Appendix 1. Chronological list of wills of the Ptolemaic, Roman and Byzantine periods, written in Greek or Latin and found in Egypt [Nos 1-166]; - 237-238: Appendix 2. Geographical distribution of the Greek and Roman Wills; - 238-239: Occurrences of εὐδοκίμησις as a title of address in chronological order [Nos 1-27]; - 239-241: Occurrences of εὐδοκιμώτατος as a title of address in Greek documentary papyri from Egypt [Nos 1-83].
